headline: Creating an integrated investment value chain
content:
Insurance Insight Creating an Integrated Investment Value-Chain
Series
Introduction
Author
The best insurance investment managers today are going beyond traditional portfolio
Adam Koursaris
management. They are integrating their investment value-chain to create optimal
Senior Director
portfolios in the context of their company’s liabilities, capital, regulatory regime, and
Product Management
planning objectives. This approach enhances value across a range of business functions and
increases risk-adjusted return on capital for shareholders.
To develop holistic or integrated asset management and ALM solutions for insurance,
Contact Us asset managers are using data and models from across the business and integrating them
Americas into the management decision-making process. This approach requires tools that use cash
+1.212.553.1653 flow information from actuarial models, and reflect the needs of the asset management
Europe function in terms of asset data, capital market insights, and investment process.
+44.20.7772.5454
Asia-Pacific There are many important and complex modeling and analytic challenges to be
+852.3551.3077 addressed to ensure that integrated asset management can lend effective insight into
Japan the management decision-making process. This paper describes these challenges, and the
+81.3.5408.4100
associated benefits of improved liability-aware asset analytics:
» Monte-Carlo scenario modeling of asset and liability portfolios
» Demand for more sophisticated and granular credit risk analysis
» Modeling liquidity premia and costs in insurance portfolios
» Building effective cash flow matching strategies
» Investment guarantees and asset-liability interaction
» Focus on capital requirements
» Optimizing return on capital
» Integrating proprietary economic and capital market views
» Analyzing exotic asset strategies
Future papers in this series discuss each of these benefits in more detail, using case studies
to illustrate how analytics and integration can be performed for effective holistic
asset management.

Moody’s Analytics offers a range of solutions to enable our clients to develop integrated asset management
and ALM solutions for insurance. We provide robust software coupled with the practical insight and expertise
of our advisory services teams. This enables our clients to exploit our years of experience solving complex
insurance ALM and asset management problems.
